job.title: Data Engineer (Machine Learning)
job.description: strongLife at MXbrstrongWe are driven by our moral imperative to advance mankind  and it all starts with our people product and purpose We always carry a deep sense of drive and passion with us If you thrive in a challenging work environment surrounded by incredible team members who will help you grow MX is the right place for youbrCome build with us and be part of an awardwinning company thats helping create meaningful and lasting change in the financial industrybrMX is on a mission to improve the financial lives of everyone We believe each of us has a moral imperative to use our time and talents to change the world for the better For this reason we are creating innovative software and partnering with financial institutions and digital banking providers to bring financial freedom to the lives of individuals families and communities MX is an awardwinning financial management onlinemobile banking and innovative wealth management tools Were looking for smart creative individuals to come build with usbrWe are looking for a Data Engineer Machine Learning with a mindset of accuracy and practical application working alongside Data Scientists to build the infrastructure required to take us into a new level of finances as they should bebrMX continues to expand its data science and engineering capabilities providing our clients and their customers with deeper information about their financial statebrstrongWhat youll get to dobrstrongulli Evaluate data pipeline and machine learning pipeline technologies lili Implement platforms that will simplify and improve the work of data analysts and scientists lili Build tools to allow Data Scientists to own machine learning models for the entire life cycle lili Be a bridge between Data Scientists and Engineers while effectively communicating business needs brliulstrongYoull do it using yourbrstrongulli Fundamental understanding of various machine learning techniques lili Foundational knowledge in Event Source design and Stream Processing architecture lili Foundational knowledge in MLOps lili Experience in deploying machine learning models to production lili 3 years of professional Python or R experience lili 3 years of professional SQL experience lili Strong mathematical background including Statistics lili Experience working with nonrelational data lili Experience not required with MLFlow RubyRails Postgres Large data structures Vertica Clickhouse Redshift ElasticSearch Hadoop or similar Kafka  Rabbit Prefect Airflow Celery and LuigbrliulstrongYoull fit in bybrstrongulli Thinking like an owner lili Balancing independent problem solving with collaboration lili Not being afraid to make mistakes and learn from them lili Communicating with honesty candor and respect lili Being bold and resourceful lili Being a passionate and empathetic team member brliulstrongYoull love it becausebrstrongulli You will build and share products that are making a difference in the lives of others lili You will collaborate with other brilliant minds lili You will be rewarded and recognized for your highcaliber work lili You will enjoy autonomy lili You will build products that outshine all of our competitors lili You will be working with established design standards and libraries lili You will work with a deeply technical engineering team
